title: Understanding Landslide Prediction and Basics of Artificial Intelligence Application

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of earth science and computer science
context.additional_context: Students learn landslide principles, prediction technologies, and basic AI model applications, enhancing scientific inquiry skills through real satellite imagery and time-series analysis

learning_goals: Explain the causes and risk factors of landslides from spatial and temporal perspectives
Understand the fundamental principles of how AI models (CAE-RNN) are applied to landslide prediction
Explain methods for evaluating regional landslide risk by analyzing satellite image data
Interpret and evaluate model performance metrics (accuracy, precision, recall)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
